name: Dedica Group
description:
Dedica Group is a multi-disciplinary creative, design and management studio that builds intimate relationships between brands and consumers. We specialize in translating and commercializing a brand vision to actionable results via key pathways. We deliver design, marketing and branding services for B2B and B2C markets – from strategy and ideation, to creative development and activation.
We provide unique creative solutions – our creative is the glue that holds everything together and brings the idea to life. We develop and deliver brand experiential destinations for domestic and international clients. Simply put, our success is driven by our ability to bring a brand to life in every aspect of the consumer experience. We work closely with our clients to truly understand their needs and the challenges they face. Our goal is to become an extension of the teams with whom we work and provide effective creative solutions to help meet their objectives.
